verses.esv: 6 Having said these things, he spit on the ground and made mud with the saliva. Then he anointed the manâ€™s eyes with the mud
verses.kjv: 6 When he had thus spoken, he spat on the ground, and made clay of the spittle, and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay,
verses.niv: 6 Having said this, he spit on the ground, made some mud with the saliva, and put it on the man's eyes.
